comments.body:
Created attachment 13467
documentation patch for logging page
Thanks. The XML was not valid, though.

Created attachment 13491
fuller documentation patch for tomcat 5.5 logging page

including introduction and jdk logging, revised log4j to include note about
small bug.
Committed a modified version of your patch.  Thank you for the contribution.

description:
The current Logging page is empty. This patch adds the informative note that 
localhost_log is gone and also details how one may use log4j to obtain internal 
logging from Tomcat.
summary: Log4j section enhancement for Tomcat Logging page
